version.description: Displays the current version of the software.

me.description: Displays information about the current user.

users.description: Lists all users in the system.

projects.description: Lists all projects in the system.

groups.description: Lists all user groups in the system.

roles.description: Lists all roles in the system.

privileges.description: Lists all privileges in the system.

symbols.description: Lists all symbols in the system.

default-symbols.description: Lists default symbols in the system.

appliances.description: Lists all appliances in the system.

user.description: Displays information about a specific user.

user-groups.description: Lists groups a user belongs to.

project.description: Displays information about a specific project.

project-stats.description: Shows statistics for a specific project.

project-locked.description: Checks if a project is locked.

group.description: Displays information about a specific group.

group-members.description: Lists members of a specific group.

role.description: Displays information about a specific role.

role-privileges.description: Lists privileges for a specific role.

template.description: Displays information about a specific template.

compute.description: Displays information about a specific compute resource.

docker-images.description: Lists Docker images for a compute resource.

virtualbox-vms.description: Lists VirtualBox VMs for a compute resource.

vmware-vms.description: Lists VMware VMs for a compute resource.

images.description: Lists images for a compute resource.

snapshots.description: Lists snapshots for a compute resource.

appliance.description: Displays information about a specific appliance.

pool.description: Displays information about a specific resource pool.

pool-resources.description: Lists resources in a specific pool.

symbol.description: Displays information about a specific symbol.

acl-rule.description: Displays information about a specific ACL rule.

node.description: Displays information about a specific node.

node-links.description: Lists links for a specific node.

link.description: Displays information about a specific link.

link-filters.description: Lists filters for a specific link.

drawing.description: Displays information about a specific drawing.
